author: bayard
msg: I believe the && here should be an ||, else it will throw an NPE and allow directories to be unarchived

author: adrianc
msg: 1. Better handling of the FreeMarker Configuration instance. Eliminated the need for synchronizing code.
2. OFBiz transforms are now kept in the Configuration object - no need to load them into the rendering context on every run.
1. Eliminated redundant Configuration object initialization by cloning the Configuration object kept in FreeMarkerWorker.
2. Now supports the "component://" syntax for page attribute.

author: bayard
msg: Removing the recursive and unused newInstance method
